Posts.Content: I too, hate the packaging.  I spend 45 min each month to "unpackage" and put in a bottle.  I only do one month at a time so I remember to re order on time.I joined the Army of Women and I am doing the City of Hope cancer walk on Nov 9. Can only do the 2.5K as I still do not have the stamina to do the 5K
Posts.Title: Arimidex Packaging
